name: A Conversation With Myself, But Its Ok if You Eavesdrop
name_original: A Conversation With Myself, But Its Ok if You Eavesdrop
description: This is a game not meant for anyone, at best being described as a personal diary or reflection. Some places bury themselves into your mind and you are left to process your experience of there. This is my personal reflection on my experience and feelings of places I've lived. You are welcome to eves-drop on this conversation despite it's private nature.
